articles.description: Jess Aldridge, 24, (middle) with her boyfriend, Ryan Shelton, 29, (right) and Jess's mother Georgina, 44, who Ryan has run off with just days after Jess gave birth to their son in Gloucestershire.
articles.content:

articles.title: Behind Her Eyes: the Book Detail Too Nasty for the Netflix Show - Den of Geek
articles.description: The villain in outlandish Netflix thriller Behind Her Eyes does terrible things, but in the book, they do something too horrid even for TV. Major spoilers ahead.
